title: Video Editor
description: We're looking for a highly skilled Video Editor (Premiere Pro) that is able to adapt to a fixed editing style and expand on it.
requirements: 2 - 3 years experience in Adobe Premiere Pro
Ability to work alone or with a partner

title: Sound Designer
description: We're looking for someone to bring the visuals in our videos to life with the use of sound design and processing the sound effects to fit the feel of a given scene.
requirements: 2 - 3 years experience in Adobe Premiere Pro (SFX Design specifically)
Ability to work alone or with a partner
application_requirements: Social Media with Work (specifically a video with only SFX)
